subscription-save.message: The Subscription has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

Subscription.EnableSubscriptions.title: Enable subscriptions
Subscription.EnableSubscriptions.description: Flag for activating subscriptions in store

Subscription.SubscriptionNewNumberTempla.title: Subscription number template
Subscription.SubscriptionNewNumberTempla.description: The template (pattern) that will be used to generate the number for new Subscription. Parameters: 0 - date (the UTC time of number generation); 1 - the sequence number.

Subscription.EnableSubscriptionProcessJo.title: Enable subscription process
Subscription.EnableSubscriptionProcessJo.description: Flag for activating automatic subscription process (requires restart)

Subscription.EnableSubscriptionOrdersCre.title: Enable subscription order creation
Subscription.EnableSubscriptionOrdersCre.description: Flag for activating automatic order creation for subscription (requires restart)

Subscription.CronExpression.title: Cron expression for scheduling subscription processing job execution (requires restart)
Subscription.CronExpression.description:
The value is a regular CRON expression.
To run task every X minutes please use "0/x * * * *".
To run it every X hours at 00 minutes use "0 */X * * *". You can also specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
To run it every X days at midnight use "0 0 */x * *"

Subscription.CronExpressionOrdersJob.title: Cron expression for scheduling subscription order creation job execution (requires restart)
Subscription.CronExpressionOrdersJob.description:
The value is a regular CRON expression.
To run task every X minutes please use "0/x * * * *".
To run it every X hours at 00 minutes use "0 */X * * *". You can also specify minutes: "15 */x * * *"
To run it every X days at midnight use "0 0 */x * *"

Subscription.PastDue.Delay.title: Past due delay in days
Subscription.PastDue.Delay.description: Delay in days when unpaid subscription obtain PastDue status

Subscription.ExportImport.Description.title: Export/Import description
Subscription.ExportImport.Description.description: Module description in platform export/import wizard
